title: Fishing for a Kling Hindu. Perhaps the BVG "1" that just sold on eBay?
author: njdunkin1

posts.post_title: Fishing for a Kling Hindu. Perhaps the BVG "1" that just sold on eBay?
posts.post_content:
Looking for an "authentic" to "2"ish, raw or graded. Paying fair market value (eBay prices). Please shoot me a PM or send me an email at [url]njdunkin1@gmail.com[/url] with anything you may have available. 

Regards,
NJ
Trying this again. Hope to have a few cards available for sale on the BST soon.
I'm sure you're aware of this, but there's a Kling Hindu on ebay. It's trimmed but may be worth picking up as filler if you can get the price down. Those hindus won't pop up often.

NJ,
Check your email and your PMs. I sent you one message to each account.

Dipping my toes back into the game. Sad to say I dipped too late and missed the BVG 1 on eBay a week ago!

Looking for a similar grade for a similar price.
Hi NJ, it's good to have you back. Sorry, but I can't help with Kling.
